search_pattern.query: SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q5 . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en" }} LIMIT 10
SELECT DISTINCT ?entity ?entityLabel WHERE {?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q82794 . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en" }} LIMIT 10
